job_details.experience_required: Minimum of 5 years of experience in integration development, with at least 3 years on the Azure platform.
job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: Hello,Hope you are doing well, This is Kiran from “GAC Solutions” . I have an excellent job opportunity with one of our clients. Please find the job description below. Role: Azure integration Lead DeveloperLocation: Sylmar, CADuration: 6+ months Job description: Seeking an Azure Integration Lead Developer for our Consumer Products client to work with team developing Azure based micro services platform. Primary Responsibilities:Lead the design, development, and implementation of integration solutions using Azure Integration Services.Develop and maintain APIs, Logic Apps, and Function APIs to facilitate communication between internal platforms.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and ensure integration solutions meet business needs.Monitor and troubleshoot integration processes to ensure optimal performance and reliability.Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers. Primary Skills:Extensive experience with Azure Integration Services (APIs, Logic Apps, Microservices, Function APIs, ADF).Strong understanding of RESTful API design and development.Proficiency in C# and .NET framework.Experience with Azure DevOps for CI/CD pipeline management.Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.Minimum of 5 years of experience in integration development, with at least 3 years on the Azure platform.Azure certifications (e.g., Azure Developer Associate, Azure Solutions Architect) are a plus.
